alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cleburne (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Calhoun and northeastern Cleburne Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Piedmont, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Piedmont, Fruithurst, Edwardsville, Muscadine, Abernathy, Mars Hills, I 20 Welcome Center, Liberty Hill, Oak Level, Sweetwater Lake and Coleman Lake And Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
